sentence: what are the capitals of the states that border texas ?
sentence-with-vars: what are the capitals of the states that border state0 ?
sql: select state.capital from state where state.state_name in ( select border_info.border from border_info where border_info.state_name = ' texas ' ) ;
sql-with-vars: select state.capital from state where state.state_name in ( select border_info.border from border_info where border_info.state_name = ' state0 ' ) ;
